verses.verse: וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> And Elisha הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet קָרָ֕א <WH7121> called לְאַחַ֖ד <WH259> one מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <WH5030> of the prophets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֜וֹ חֲגֹ֣ר <WH2296> unto him Gird up מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <WH4975> thy loins וְ֠קַח <WH3947> and take פַּ֣ךְ <WH6378> this box הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> of oil הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> in thine hand וְלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> and go רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וּבָ֖אתָ <WH935> And when thou comest שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there וּרְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> thither look out שָׁ֠ם <WH8033> there יֵה֨וּא <WH3058> there Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נִמְשִׁ֗י <WH5250> of Nimshi וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> and go in וַהֲקֵֽמֹתוֹ֙ <WH6965> and make him arise up מִתּ֣וֹך <WH8432> from among אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> his brethren וְהֵבֵיאתָ֥ <WH935> and carry אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> חֶ֥דֶר <WH2315> him to an inner בְּחָֽדֶר׃ <WH2315> chamber

וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> Then take פַךְ־ <WH6378> the box הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> of oil וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <WH3332> and pour עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> [it] on his head וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> and say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <WH4886> I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> thee king אֶל־ <WH413> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וּפָתַחְתָּ֥ <WH6605> Then open הַדֶּ֛לֶת <WH1817> the door וְנַ֖סְתָּה <WH5127> and flee וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תְחַכֶּֽה׃ <WH2442> and tarry
וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> So the young man הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> [even] the young man הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> And when he came וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> behold the captains הַחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> of the host יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <WH3427> [were] sitting וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and he said דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> I have an errand לִ֛י אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> for הַשָּׂ֑ר <WH8269> to thee O captain וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> And Jehu אֶל־ <WH413> for מִ֣י <WH4310> which מִכֻּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3605> and he וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Unto which of all us? And he said אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> for הַשָּֽׂר׃ <WH8269> To thee O captain

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> And he arose וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and went הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> and he poured הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> the oil אֶל־ <WH413> over רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> on his head וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מְשַׁחְתִּ֧יךָֽ <WH4886> I have anointed לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> thee king אֶל־ <WH413> over עַ֥ם <WH5971> over the people יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [even] over Israel

וְהִ֨כִּיתָ֔ה <WH5221> And thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> of Ahab אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <WH113> thy master וְנִקַּמְתִּ֞י <WH5358> that I may avenge דְּמֵ֣י ׀ <WH1818> the blood עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> of my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <WH5030> the prophets וּדְמֵ֛י <WH1818> and the blood כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> of all the servants יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> at the hand אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <WH348> of Jezebel

וְאָבַ֖ד <WH6> shall perish כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> For the whole house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> and I will cut off לְאַחְאָב֙ <WH256> from Ahab מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <WH8366> him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <WH7023> against the wall וְעָצ֥וּר <WH6113> and him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <WH5800> and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab כְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> like the house יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֑ט <WH5028> of Nebat וּכְבֵ֖ית <WH1004> and like the house בַּעְשָׁ֥א <WH1201> of Baasha בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <WH281> of Ahijah

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִיזֶ֜בֶל <WH348> Jezebel יֹאכְל֧וּ <WH398> shall eat הַכְּלָבִ֛ים <WH3611> And the dogs בְּחֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> in the portion יִזְרְעֶ֖אל <WH3157> of Jezreel וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and none קֹבֵ֑ר <WH6912> and [there shall be] none to bury וַיִּפְתַּ֥ח <WH6605> [her] And he opened הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> the door וַיָּנֹֽס׃ <WH5127> and fled

וְיֵה֗וּא <WH3058> Then Jehu יָצָא֙ <WH3318> came forth אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> to the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> of his lord וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and [one] said לוֹ֙ הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> favor מַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> how בָּֽא־ <WH935> come הַמְשֻׁגָּ֥ע <WH7696> this mad הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> [fellow] to thee? And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> You יְדַעְתֶּ֥ם <WH3045> unto them Ye know אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> the man וְאֶת־ <WH853> שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ <WH7879> and his communication

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> [It is] false הַגֶּד־ <WH5046> tell נָ֖א <WH4994> now לָ֑נוּ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> us now And he said כָּזֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise וְכָזֹאת֙ <WH2063> he אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus and thus spake אֵלַי֙ <WH413> over לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> he to me saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <WH4886> I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> thee king אֶל־ <WH413> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <WH4116> Then they hasted וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> and took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man בִּגְד֔וֹ <WH899> his garment וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> under אֶל־ <WH413> on גֶּ֣רֶם <WH1634> [it] under him on the top הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> of the stairs וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <WH8628> and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> with trumpets וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> saying מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> is king יֵהֽוּא׃ <WH3058> Jehu

וַיִּתְקַשֵּׁ֗ר <WH7194> conspired יֵה֛וּא <WH3058> So Jehu בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נִמְשִׁ֖י <WH5250> of Nimshi אֶל־ <WH413> against יוֹרָ֑ם <WH3141> against Joram וְיוֹרָם֩ <WH3141> (Now Joram הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become שֹׁמֵ֜ר <WH8104> had kept בְּרָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> Gilead ה֚וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> he and all Israel מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> because חֲזָאֵ֖ל <WH2371> of Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> of Syria

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> was returned יְהוֹרָ֨ם <WH3088> Joram הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> But king לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <WH7495> to be healed בִיְזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> in Jezreel מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמַּכִּים֙ <WH4347> of the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יַכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5221> had given אֲרַמִּ֔ים <WH761> which the Syrians בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <WH3898> him when he fought אֶת־ <WH854> with חֲזָאֵ֖ל <WH2371> with Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of Aram וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> Jehu אִם־ <WH518> If יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> If it be נַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH5315> your minds אַל־ <WH408> [then] let none יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> go forth פָלִיט֙ <WH6412> [nor] escape מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> out of the city לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> to go [לְגִּיד כ] (לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> bewray ק) בְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> [it] in Jezreel

וַיִּרְכַּ֤ב <WH7392> rode in a chariot יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> So Jehu וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went יִזְרְעֶ֔אלָה <WH3157> to Jezreel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יוֹרָ֖ם <WH3141> for Joram שֹׁכֵ֣ב <WH7901> lay שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there וַֽאֲחַזְיָה֙ <WH274> there And Ahaziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah יָרַ֖ד <WH3381> was come down לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹרָֽם׃ <WH3141> Joram

וְהַצֹּפֶה֩ <WH6822> a watchman עֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> And there stood עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּגְדָּ֜ל <WH4026> on the tower בְּיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> in Jezreel וַיַּ֞רְא <WH7200> and he spied אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁפְעַ֤ת <WH8229> the company יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> of Jehu בְּבֹא֔וֹ <WH935> as he came וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said שִׁפְעַ֖ת <WH8229> a company אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> I see וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹרָ֗ם <WH3088> And Joram קַ֥ח <WH3947> Take רַכָּ֛ב <WH7395> an horseman וּֽשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> and send לִקְרָאתָ֖ם <WH7125> to meet וְיֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> them and let him say הֲשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> favor

וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> went רֹכֵ֨ב <WH7392> bring הַסּ֜וּס <WH5483> crane לִקְרָאת֗וֹ <WH7125> to meet וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> him and said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> favor וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יֵה֛וּא <WH3058> Jehu מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֥ וּלְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> favor סֹ֣ב <WH5437> make אֶֽל־ <WH413> about אַחֲרָ֑י <WH310> thee behind וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> told הַצֹּפֶה֙ <WH6822> me And the watchman לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בָּֽא־ <WH935> came הַמַּלְאָ֥ךְ <WH4397> The messenger עַד־ <WH5704> against הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָֽׁב׃ <WH7725> to them but he cometh not again

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> Then he sent out רֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> bring סוּס֮ <WH5483> crane שֵׁנִי֒ <WH8145> a second וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> which came אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> to them and said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> Thus saith הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> favor וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> answered יֵה֛וּא <WH3058> Jehu מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֥ וּלְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> favor סֹ֥ב <WH5437> make אֶֽל־ <WH413> about אַחֲרָֽי׃ <WH310> thee behind

וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> told הַצֹּפֶה֙ <WH6822> And the watchman לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בָּ֥א <WH935> He came עַד־ <WH5704> even אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁ֑ב <WH7725> even unto them and cometh not again וְהַמִּנְהָ֗ג <WH4491> and the driving כְּמִנְהַג֙ <WH4491> [is] like the driving יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> of Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <WH5250> of Nimshi כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בְשִׁגָּע֖וֹן <WH7697> furiously יִנְהָֽג׃ <WH5090> for he driveth

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> And Joram אֱסֹ֔ר <WH631> Make ready וַיֶּאְסֹ֖ר <WH631> was made ready רִכְבּ֑וֹ <WH7393> And his chariot וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out יְהוֹרָ֣ם <WH3088> And Joram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel וַאֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <WH274> and Ahaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> each בְּרִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> in his chariot וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> and they went out לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> against יֵה֔וּא <WH3058> Jehu וַיִּמְצָאֻ֔הוּ <WH4672> and met בְּחֶלְקַ֖ת <WH2513> him in the portion נָב֥וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <WH3158> the Jezreelite

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> saw יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> And it came to pass when Joram אֶת־ <WH853> יֵה֔וּא <WH3058> Jehu וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> that he said הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> [Is it] peace יֵה֑וּא <WH3058> Jehu וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הַשָּׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> What peace עַד־ <WH5704> so long as זְנוּנֵ֞י <WH2183> the whoredoms אִיזֶ֧בֶל <WH348> Jezebel אִמְּךָ֛ <WH517> of thy mother וּכְשָׁפֶ֖יהָ <WH3785> and her witchcrafts הָרַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> in abundance

וַיַּהֲפֹ֧ךְ <WH2015> turned יְהוֹרָ֛ם <WH3088> And Joram יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> his hands וַיָּנֹ֑ס <WH5127> and fled וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <WH274> to Ahaziah מִרְמָ֥ה <WH4820> [There is] treachery אֲחַזְיָֽה׃ <WH274> O Ahaziah

וְיֵה֞וּא <WH3058> And Jehu מִלֵּ֧א <WH4390> with his full יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> strength בַקֶּ֗שֶׁת <WH7198> drew a bow וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> Jehoram בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between זְרֹעָ֔יו <WH2220> between his arms וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out הַחֵ֖צִי <WH2678> and the arrow מִלִּבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> at his heart וַיִּכְרַ֖ע <WH3766> and he sunk down בְּרִכְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7393> in his chariot

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּדְקַר֙ <WH920> [Jehu] to Bidkar [שְׁלֹשָׁה כ] (שָֽׁלִשֹׁ֔ו <WH7991> captain ק) שָׂ֚א <WH5375> Take up הַשְׁלִכֵ֔הוּ <WH7993> [and] cast בְּחֶלְקַ֕ת <WH2513> him in the portion שְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> of the field נָב֣וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֑י <WH3158> the Jezreelite כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זְכֹ֞ר <WH2142> for remember אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וָאַ֗תָּה <WH859> you אֵ֣ת <WH853> רֹכְבִ֤ים <WH7392> how that when I and thou rode צְמָדִים֙ <WH6776> together אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אַחְאָ֣ב <WH256> Ahab אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3069> God נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> laid עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> this burden הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֡א <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH853> דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> the blood נָבוֹת֩ <WH5022> of Naboth וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּמֵ֨י <WH1818> and the blood בָנָ֜יו <WH1121> of his sons רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> Surely I have seen אֶ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH570> yesterday נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֥י <WH7999> and I will requite לְךָ֛ בַּחֶלְקָ֥ה <WH2513> thee in this plat הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שָׂ֧א <WH5375> Now therefore take הַשְׁלִכֵ֛הוּ <WH7993> [and] cast בַּחֶלְקָ֖ה <WH2513> him into the plat כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> [of ground] according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַאֲחַזְיָ֤ה <WH274> But when Ahaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah רָאָ֔ה <WH7200> saw וַיָּ֕נָס <WH5127> [this] he fled דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַגָּ֑ן <WH1588> of the garden וַיִּרְדֹּ֨ף <WH7291> followed אַחֲרָ֜יו <WH310> after יֵה֗וּא <WH3058> And Jehu וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> him and said גַּם־ <WH1571> too אֹת֞וֹ <WH853> הַכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5221> Smite אֶל־ <WH413> in הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֗ה <WH4818> him also in the chariot בְּמַֽעֲלֵה־ <WH4608> [And they did so] at the going up גוּר֙ <WH1483> to Gur אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִבְלְעָ֔ם <WH2991> which [is] by Ibleam וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> And he fled מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> to Megiddo וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> and died שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיַּרְכִּ֧בוּ <WH7392> carried אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> And his servants יְרוּשָׁלְָ֑מָה <WH3389> him in a chariot to Jerusalem וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <WH6912> and buried אֹת֧וֹ <WH853> בִקְבֻרָת֛וֹ <WH6900> him in his sepulchre עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> with his fathers בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David פ

וּבִשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year אַחַ֣ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לְיוֹרָ֖ם <WH3141> of Joram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> to reign אֲחַזְיָ֖ה <WH274> began Ahaziah עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> over Judah

וַיָּב֥וֹא <WH935> was come יֵה֖וּא <WH3058> And when Jehu יִזְרְעֶ֑אלָה <WH3157> to Jezreel וְאִיזֶ֣בֶל <WH348> Jezebel שָׁמְעָ֗ה <WH8085> heard וַתָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> appoint בַּפּ֤וּךְ <WH6320> fair colours עֵינֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5869> her face וַתֵּ֣יטֶב <WH3190> and tired אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשָׁ֔הּ <WH7218> her head וַתַּשְׁקֵ֖ף <WH8259> and looked out בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> out הַחַלּֽוֹן׃ <WH2474> at a window

וְיֵה֖וּא <WH3058> And as Jehu בָּ֣א <WH935> entered in בַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> at the gate וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> she said הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> peace זִמְרִ֖י <WH2174> [Had] Zimri הֹרֵ֥ג <WH2026> who slew אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> your master's

וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> And he lifted up פָנָיו֙ <WH6440> his face אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣חַלּ֔וֹן <WH2474> to the window וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מִ֥י <WH4310> Who אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for מִ֑י <WH4310> Who וַיַּשְׁקִ֣יפוּ <WH8259> Who [is] on my side? who? And there looked out אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> to him two שְׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> [or] three סָרִיסִֽים׃ <WH5631> eunuchs

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said [שִׁמְטֻהוּ כ] (שִׁמְט֖וּהָ <WH8058> Throw ק) וַֽיִּשְׁמְט֑וּהָ <WH8058> Throw her down וַיִּ֨ז <WH5137> was sprinkled מִדָּמָ֧הּ <WH1818> and [some] of her blood אֶל־ <WH413> on הַקִּ֛יר <WH7023> on the wall וְאֶל־ <WH413> and on הַסּוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> and on the horses וַֽיִּרְמְסֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7429> and he trode her under foot

וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> And when he was come in וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> he did eat וַיֵּ֑שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said פִּקְדוּ־ <WH6485> Go נָ֞א <WH4994> now אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲרוּרָ֤ה <WH779> see now this cursed הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise וְקִבְר֔וּהָ <WH6912> [woman] and bury כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בַת־ <WH1323> daughter מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> her for she [is] a king's הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> They

וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went לְקָבְרָ֑הּ <WH6912> to bury וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nothing מָ֣צְאוּ <WH4672> her but they found בָ֗הּ כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> no more of her than הַגֻּלְגֹּ֛לֶת <WH1538> the skull וְהָרַגְלַ֖יִם <WH7272> and the feet וְכַפּ֥וֹת <WH3709> and the palms הַיָּדָֽיִם׃ <WH3027> of [her] hands

וַיָּשֻׁבוּ֮ <WH7725> Wherefore they came again וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> and told לוֹ֒ וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> him And he said דְּבַר־ <WH1697> This [is] the word יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD ה֔וּא <WH1931> This אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֗ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by עַבְדּ֛וֹ <WH5650> his servant אֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <WH452> Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <WH8664> the Tishbite לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בְּחֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> In the portion יִזְרְעֶ֔אל <WH3157> of Jezreel יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> eat הַכְּלָבִ֖ים <WH3611> shall dogs אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> the flesh אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <WH348> of Jezebel

[וְהָיָת כ] (וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> become ק) נִבְלַ֣ת <WH5038> And the carcase אִיזֶ֗בֶל <WH348> of Jezebel כְּדֹ֛מֶן <WH1828> shall be as dung עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field בְּחֵ֣לֶק <WH2506> in the portion יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <WH3157> of Jezreel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יֹאמְר֖וּ <WH559> [so] that they shall not say זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <WH348> This [is] Jezebel פ
